YACY_INIT_ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: Administrator initial password : please fill with a Base64 MD5 value

YACY_PUBLIC_URL.description: External URL used by other peers to reach yours, required to run in 'Senior' mode. You chould set it with [your_app_name].herokuapp.com.

MAVEN_CUSTOM_OPTS.description: Custom options required for maven build on Heroku.
